=================================================
 
Series telling the story of capital punishment through the eyes of young people whose lives have been shaped by it.

 


1/3 For two of the youngest men on death row in Texas, execution day has arrived.

2/3 Film following the trial of a man accused of beating eight members of his family to death.
 
3/3 A law student fights for the lives of two of the youngest killers facing execution.
